import React from'react';import Chart from'react-apexcharts';import{Card,Row,Col}from'react-bootstrap';// components
import{WorldVectorMap}from'../../../components/VectorMap/';import CardTitle from'../../../components/CardTitle';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CountrySessionsChart=function CountrySessionsChart(){var colors=['rgba(114, 124, 245, 0.85)'];// apex chart config
var apexBarChartOpts={grid:{padding:{left:0,right:15}},chart:{type:'bar',height:350,parentHeightOffset:0,toolbar:{show:false}},plotOptions:{bar:{horizontal:true}},colors:colors,dataLabels:{enabled:false},xaxis:{categories:['India','China','United States','Japan','France','Italy','Netherlands','United Kingdom','Canada','South Korea'],labels:{formatter:function formatter(val){return val+'%';}}}};var apexBarChartData=[{name:'Sessions',data:[90,75,60,50,45,36,28,20,15,12]}];// vector map config
var options={series:{regions:[{attribute:'fill',scale:{ScaleKR:'#e6ebff',ScaleCA:'#b3c3ff',ScaleGB:'#809bfe',ScaleNL:'#4d73fe',ScaleIT:'#1b4cfe',ScaleFR:'#727cf5',ScaleJP:'#e7fef7',ScaleUS:'#e7e9fd',ScaleCN:'#8890f7',ScaleIN:'#727cf5'},values:{KR:'ScaleKR',CA:'ScaleCA',GB:'ScaleGB',NL:'ScaleNL',IT:'ScaleIT',FR:'ScaleFR',JP:'ScaleJP',US:'ScaleUS',CN:'ScaleCN',IN:'ScaleIN'}}]}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{containerClass:"d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between mb-3",title:"Sessions By Country",menuItems:[{label:'Refresh Report'},{label:'Export Report'}]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:8,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-3 mb-3",style:{height:'300px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WorldVectorMap,{height:"100%",width:"100%",options:options})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chart,{options:apexBarChartOpts,series:apexBarChartData,type:"bar",height:320})})]})]})});};export default CountrySessionsChart;
